text: Abdulla Nigmatovich Aripov (, ; born 24 May 1961) is an Uzbekistani politician. He is the Prime Minister of Uzbekistan, in office since 14 December 2016. Aripov is a member of the Uzbekistan Liberal Democratic Party. He was Deputy Prime Minister from 2002 to 2012 and again in 2016. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Uzbekistan Category:Politicians from Tashkent
title: Abdulla Aripov
